original_text: (This was after King Jehoiachin and the queen mother, the court officials and the leaders of Judah and Jerusalem, the skilled workers and the artisans had gone into exile from Jerusalem.)
korean_text: 그 때는 여고니야 왕과 왕후와 궁중 내시들과 유다와 예루살렘의 고관들과 기능공과 토공들이 예루살렘에서 떠난 후라

sentences.original_text: This was after King Jehoiachin and the queen mother
the court officials and the leaders of Judah and Jerusalem
the skilled workers and the artisans
had gone into exile from Jerusalem
